workshoptitle: Access the Data Lake using Autonomous Database and Data Catalog

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Data Catalog.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Review the Workshop Environment (Optional)
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the required and optional tasks to setup your workshop environment.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Harvest Metadata from Oracle Object Storage
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through how to harvest technical metadata from Oracle Object Storage.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Synchronize Autonomous Database with Data Catalog
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to synchronize ADB and Data Catalog.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Query Data Across Autonomous Database and the Data Lake
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to query data from ADB and Object Storage.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
